content: the valentine cowl is a stranded colorwork pattern worked in the round with a full step-by-step video tutorial 1 to go with it **sizing** 3 sizes xs s m *the xs is very snug i would only recommend that size if you want a very snug cowl or for a childs size * * circumference 17 25 20 75 24 25 inches 44 52 5 61 5 cm * length 8 25 inches 21cm for all sizes *note cast on more stitches in multiples of 16 to increase the circumference and work additional repeats of the colorwork pattern to add length these adjustments will affect the yardage * **yarn** worsted/medium #4 weight * mc 100 120 135 yards 91 110 123 meters * cc 35 40 45 yards 32 37 41 meters *sample uses mc i love this yarn 100% acrylic - 355 yards 325 m /198g in rosy cheeks cc amigo xl 100% acrylic - 109 yards 100 m /50g in color 50 * *yardage is an estimate based on my sample yours may vary if your gauge or cast on amount is different * other materials yarn needle and stitch marker **needles** * gauge us 7 4 5 mm circular needles in 16 40 cm cord length or size needed to match gauge * rib circular needles 1-2 sizes smaller than the gauge needles in the same cord length sample used us 5 3 75 mm **gauge** stockinette colorwork chart - in the round 18 5 sts / 26 rounds = 4″ 10 cm *chart on page 3 for reference * 1 https //youtu be/mamy6rneufq
